verbs.description: [V: harry] potter fans invited to pottercon philly in may a new harry potter - themed event will come to the city pottercon philly invites adult fans to mingle drink and play pretend at the theatre of living arts on may 14 harry potter theatre of living arts butterbeer chestnut hill philly philadelphia
